mapper.select: SELECT AD_ID AS adId, AD_NAME AS adName, AD_PHONE AS adPhone, AD_EMAIL AS adEmail, AD_DEPT_NAME AS adDeptName, AD_GROUP AS adGroup FROM ADDRESS ORDER BY adId DESC -- 번호를 기준으로 내림차순 정렬

SELECT AD_ID AS adId, AD_NAME AS adName, AD_PHONE AS adPhone, AD_EMAIL AS adEmail, AD_DEPT_NAME AS adDeptName, AD_GROUP AS adGroup FROM ADDRESS WHERE LOWER(${category}) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{query}) || '%' ORDER BY adId DESC -- 번호를 기준으로 내림차순 정렬
SELECT AD_ID AS adId, AD_NAME AS adName, AD_PHONE AS adPhone, AD_EMAIL AS adEmail, AD_DEPT_NAME AS adDeptName, AD_GROUP AS adGroup FROM ADDRESS WHERE AD_ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADDRESS (ad_id, AD_NAME, AD_PHONE, AD_EMAIL, AD_DEPT_NAME, AD_GROUP, AD_CREATED_DATE, AD_UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( address_seq.NEXTVAL, #{adName}, #{adPhone}, #{adEmail}, #{adDeptName}, #{adGroup}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE ADDRESS SET AD_NAME = #{adName}, AD_PHONE = #{adPhone}, AD_EMAIL = #{adEmail}, AD_DEPT_NAME = #{adDeptName}, AD_GROUP = #{adGroup} WHERE AD_ID = #{adId}
